Header: Kilinochchi Troops Refresh Knowledge on English & Its Usage
Content: An initiative for enhancement of knowledge on English language and its usage was taken by the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi (SFHQ-KLN) on the instructions of Major General Niyshshanka Ranawana, Commander, Security Forces - Kilinochchi (SF-KLN) a few months ago after the SFHQ-KLN closely identified this requirement among officers. Accordingly, Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, General Officer Commanding (GOC), 57 Division who was also the former Director General Training was entrusted the task of organizing these courses. The first phase of the course commenced on August 17 and the second phase continued from August 27 - 31 under the tutelage of Mrs Manoranjani Manoharan, a well-known English Instructor in Kilinochchi area. SFHQ-KLN expects to continue the arrangement in future too.
